mean_en: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true or correct; used as a polite way of giving somebody permission to do something; used as a polite way of agreeing with what somebody has just said; used to show that what you are saying is not surprising or is generally known or accepted
sentence: Of course, the man with the strong arm will win.
sentence_trans: 当然胳膊强壮的人会赢得比赛啦。
